## Options.defaultPolicyVersion property

[Default policy version](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/configuration/engine#default_policy_version) to apply to requests that do not specify one.

**Signature:**

```typescript
defaultPolicyVersion?: string | undefined;
```
